review: YAP is a very convenient App for transferring money between my friends and family not only that it is also super beneficial and makes every day purchases so easy By adding my YAP card to my Apple Pay Wallet I tap it everywhere and at anytime especially when I am on a rush to buy things I dont need to carry my card around so thats makes it a seamless and easy process
title: Apple Pay Payment
developerResponse: {'id': 25941858, 'body': 'Thank you for taking the time to give us a nice review Lulu üëç', 'modified': '2022-01-19T09:23:04Z'}

review: Its been 4 days since Ive been using YAP Easily the top neobank in its category I applied for a card mid last week and had someone deliver my package 3 days later What I really like on here is the ability to create multiple virtual cards that really help control unnecessary spend Aside from that its just simple and straightforward unlike other banking apps that take away hours just trying to figure out how and where to navigate
title: 4 Day review
developerResponse: {'id': 25457866, 'body': "Thank you so much for the nice review! We're glad to hear you're enjoying your account and making use of our virtual cards feature ü•∞", 'modified': '2021-10-03T06:49:48Z'}

review: Simple Quick and convenient YAP offers a quick and convenient to you These are the most user friendly service app services offered for money transfer pay Friends and family receiving funds Your money is available within a few clicks and not to mention their security and member protected information If anything mysterious shows on my account my issue is resolved immediately or Im easily able to contact YAP support to assist with my issue I wish all apps were this easy continent and customer driven I recommend YAP to all friends and family Thank you YAP for the excellent service I truly appreciate every detailed process
title: Amazing product

review: I opened my account around 20 days ago Got my card in around 3 days and still unable to use my card due to some documents requirement EID scan was carried out successfully YAP doesnt tell me which document are further required I contacted the customer service twice but they say that your account is still processing Liv by Emirates NBD didnt have such issues and my account was opened in one go Didnt expect such service by YAP Kinda disappointed here

review: I tried to send money to my family in the Philippines I was amazed to their charges it was cheaper compare to others And it was so quick my family got them instantly No hassle Stress free Thank you YAP Great app experience All the best

review: I started using YAP and I am absolutely amazed Its so easy to add your fees and do all your transactions without the need to enter a physical Bank
